resources.string: An unexpected error occurred. If this is the first time you are seeing this message, please try again. If you continue to receive this message, please contact us for help at jawwy.sa/support.

Problem updating payment method\nInvalid credit card information
Problem updating payment method\nUnknown credit card
Problem removing payment method\nIt is used for top-up
Problem updating payment method (%s)\nPlease try again
Problem setting card as default\nPlease try again
Address / CVV verification failed\nPlease try again
